00013 #define MID(x) \
00014         ((((x) / 256) * 256) + 128 )
00015 
00016 #define XCMP(a, b, v) \
00017         ((v) < 0) ? ((a) >= MID(b)) : (MID(b) >= (a))
00018 
00019 #define SCALE(x, v) \
00020         ((v) < 0) ? (MID(x)) : (MID(x))
00021 
00022 class XY : public CoordStruct {
00023 public:
00024         XY(int _x, int _y) {
00025                 X = _x;
00026                 Y = _y;
00027                 Z = 0;
00028         }
00029 
00030         XY(CoordStruct *crd) {
00031                 X = crd->X;
00032                 Y = crd->Y;
00033                 Z = 0;
00034         }
00035 
00036         bool operator< (const XY& RHS) {
00037                 if(X > RHS.X) {
00038                         return false;
00039                 }
00040                 if(X == RHS.X) {
00041                         return Y < RHS.Y;
00042                 }
00043                 return true;
00044         }
00045 
00046         void normalize() {
00047                 X = MID(X);
00048                 Y = MID(Y);
00049         }
00050 };
00051 
00052 class Trajectory {
00053         XY st;
00054         XY en;
00055 
00056         int dirX;
00057         int dirY;
00058 
00059 public:
00060         typedef std::vector<XY> vec;
00061 
00062         Trajectory(XY &s, XY &e)
00063                 : st(s), en(e)
00064         {
00065                 dirX = st.X < en.X ? 1 : -1;
00066                 dirY = st.Y < en.Y ? 1 : -1;
00067         }
00068 
00069         Trajectory(int stx, int sty, int enx, int eny)
00070                 : st(stx, sty), en(enx, eny)
00071         {
00072                 dirX = st.X < en.X ? 1 : -1;
00073                 dirY = st.Y < en.Y ? 1 : -1;
00074         }
00075 
00076         void path(std::vector<XY> &hitCoords) {
00077                 hitCoords.clear();
00078 
00079                 if(MID(st.X) != MID(en.X)) {
00080                         walkX(hitCoords);
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 if(MID(st.Y) != MID(en.Y)) {
00084                         walkY(hitCoords);
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 std::sort(hitCoords.begin(), hitCoords.end());
00088 
00089                 hitCoords.erase(std::unique(hitCoords.begin(), hitCoords.end()), hitCoords.end());
00090         }
00091 
00092 private:
00093         void walkX(std::vector<XY> &hitCoords) {
00094                 int step = dirX * 256;
00095                 for(int step_x = SCALE(st.X, dirX); XCMP(step_x, en.X, dirX); step_x += step) {
00096                         int step_y = st.Y + int(dirY * stepY(step_x));
00097                         XY temp(step_x, step_y);
00098                         temp.normalize();
00099                         hitCoords.push_back(temp);
00100                 }
00101         }
00102 
00103         void walkY(std::vector<XY> &hitCoords) {
00104                 int step = dirY * 256;
00105                 for(int step_y = SCALE(st.Y, dirY); XCMP(step_y, en.Y, dirY); step_y += step) {
00106                         int step_x = st.X + int(dirX * stepX(step_y));
00107                         XY temp(step_x, step_y);
00108                         temp.normalize();
00109                         hitCoords.push_back(temp);
00110                 }
00111         }
00112 
00113         double _tg() {
00114                 return (abs(en.Y - st.Y) * 1.0) / abs(en.X - st.X);
00115         }
00116 
00117         double stepX(int Y) {
00118                 return (abs(st.Y - Y) / _tg());
00119         }
00120 
00121         double stepY(int X) {
00122                 return (abs(st.X - X) * _tg());
00123         }
00124 };

00146 class CellSpreadIterator {
00147 protected:
00148         CellStruct *origin;
00149         DWORD radius;
00150         DWORD position;
00151         CellSpreadApplicator callback;
00152 
00153         public:
00154                 CellSpreadIterator(CellSpreadApplicator &_callback, CellStruct *_origin, DWORD _radius)
00155                         : origin(_origin), radius(_radius), position(0), callback(_callback)
00156                         { }
00157 
00158                 void Apply() {
00159                         DWORD countCells = CellSpread::NumCells(radius);
00160 
00161                         for(; position < countCells; ++position) {
00162                                 CellStruct tmpCell = CellSpread::GetCell(position);
00163                                 tmpCell += *origin;
00164                                 if(MapClass::Global()->CellExists(&tmpCell)) {
00165                                         CellClass *c = MapClass::Global()->GetCellAt(&tmpCell);
00166                                         for(ObjectClass *curObj = c->GetContent(); curObj; curObj = curObj->NextObject) {
00167                                                 callback(curObj, origin);
00168                                         }
00169                                 }
00170                         }
00171                 }
00172 };

00174 class CellSequence {
00175         XY sta;
00176         XY end;
00177 
00178 public:
00179         CellSequence(CoordStruct *From, CoordStruct *To)
00180          : sta(From), end(To)
00181         {
00182         }
00183 
00184         void Apply(CellSequenceApplicator& Callback) {
00185                 Trajectory T(sta.X, sta.Y, end.X, end.Y);
00186 
00187                 Trajectory::vec allCells;
00188 
00189                 T.path(allCells);
00190 
00191                 for(Trajectory::vec::iterator i = allCells.begin(); i != allCells.end(); ++i) {
00192                         CellClass *Cell = MapClass::Instance->GetCellAt(&*i);
00193                         Callback(Cell);
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 };
